title: Locate
text: Locate the ten thousands place in the number
speech: Locate the ten thousands place in the number
pacedSpeech: Locate the ten thousands place in the number

title: Value
text: What is the value of the ten thousands place?
speech: What is the value of the ten thousands place?
pacedSpeech: What is the value of the ten thousands place?

title: Next Value
text: Check the next value to the right of the indicated ten thousands number
speech: Check the next value to the right of the indicated ten thousands number
pacedSpeech: Check the next value to the right of the indicated ten thousands number

title: Rule
text: If the number to the right of the ten thousands number is greater than or equal to $$5$$ then add one to the ten thousands place number and make everything after to 0s. If it is less than $$5$$, then leave the ten thousands place number the same and change everything after to 0s.
